description:
On contrary to popular belief, the UN is one of the biggest criminal and depopulation agencies in the world. They don't go to any country except that the country is worse off that before they arrived. Their biggest depopulation efforts are in Africa and they have been consistently keeping generations living in civil unrest, man-made diseases,  famine caused by weather warfare like draughts etc. 

#africa #african #africanpeople #covidafrica #africanchildren #unitednations #depopulation #populationcontrol #genocide #injustice #crimesagainsthumanity #crimesagainstchildren #agenda21 #agenda30 #newworldorder #illuminati #billgates #arrestbillgates #worldhealthorganization
